127.company: Công Ty TNHH HCL Technologies Việt Nam
127.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 45 - 68 triệu VNĐ)  Top 3 Reasons To Join Us Attractive Salary and Performance Bonus Health Care for Employees & Family, 18 paid leaves Chance to travel onsite (in 53 countries) The Job At ANZ Plus, our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. We are making this happen by improving our customers' financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things - be it buying a home, building a business, or saving for things big or small. We are looking for people who are passionate about transformational change and to help us redefine banking for the future.  Be a part of building the ideal data and ML/AI ecosystem from scratch. Spearhead the integration of the latest capabilities to enhance customer experiences and transform business operations. Embrace the vision of democratizing ML/AI technology, making it accessible to all by establishing robust engineering standards, simplifying complexities, and designing effective controls and guardrails. This leadership role goes beyond conventional boundaries, empowering you to lead and innovate across many aspects of our data enablement value stream.  What will your day look like Your role as an MLOps Engineer will be similar to DevOps engineer, with stretched focus on productionizing Machine Learning features.  Design and implement scalable AI solutions that enables data engineers and ML scientists to train, build and maintain machine learning models effectively. Develop automated processes for continuous model training and evaluation pipelines specifically for ML applications. Ensure the seamless integration of ANZ Plus's current architecture with newly added ML functionalities, enhancing overall system capabilities. Collaborating with diverse stakeholders including business partners, risk, legal and security teams, as well as UX designers and architects to define and implement robust validation and verification strategies Fostering a culture of quality coding practices, including test-driven development, unit testing and secure coding awareness Focus on business practicality and the 80/20 rule, aiming for high bar for code quality, but recognize the business benefit of "having something now" vs "perfection sometime in the future"  Your Skills and Experience To grow and be successful in this role, you will bring extensive analytical and technical skills, business acumen and natural curiosity to deliver on product investigations and analysis and support initiatives through insights. You will ideally bring the following:  Proficiency in one of the scripting/programming languages (Python). Experience in building data products using GCP/ AWS technologies such . Experience with containerization, Terraform, and GitOps principles for automation and deployment. Strong background in ML concepts and applications and in-depth knowledge of MLOps best practices. Agile development mindset, appreciating the benefit of constant iteration and improvement Have experience of addressing Tech Debt with minimizing production incidents Familiarity with RAG architectures and/or have a good understanding of its application  You're not expected to have 100% of these skills. At ANZ a growth mindset is at the heart of our culture, so if you have most of these things in your toolbox, we'd love to hear from you. Why You'll Love Working Here  18 paid leaves/year (12 annual leaves and 6 personal leaves) Insurance plan based on full salary + 13th month salary + Performance bonus Meal allowance of 730,000 VND/month 100% full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working Medical benefit for employee and family Working in a fast-paced, flexible, and multinational working environment. Chance to travel onsite (in 53 countries) Free snacks, refreshment, and parking Internal training (Technical & Functional & English) Working time: 8:30 AM - 6:00 PM from Mondays to Fridays  Why join ANZ? Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. That's why we strive to create balanced, sustainable economy in which everyone can take part and build a better life. By helping people make the most of what they have, we transform ideas, hard work and ambition into reality.  Career development means different things to different people. It may simply mean developing a skill, broadening your experience by moving sideways or stretching yourself by moving to a different business. How you manage and develop your career is up to you, but ANZ is committed to helping you do this by providing you with the support, tools and resources you need. ANZ recognises the value of an inclusive and diverse work environment. We take pride in the diversity of our people and encourage applications from diverse candidates. Our recruitment decisions are based on the key inherent needs and requirements of each role, and candidates are selected based on their unique strengths and characteristics. We work flexibly at ANZ. Talk to us and let us know how this role can be flexible for you.  Please Note: After your initial application you may be asked to complete an online assessment, this invite will be sent to you via email from our assessment partner SHL. Please action this request as early as possible, this will enable us to manage your application and provide you with an update in a timely manner.Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:18 paid leaves/year (12 annual leaves and 6 personal leaves) Insurance plan based on full salary + 13th month salary + Performance bonus Meal allowance of 730,000 VND/month 100% full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working Medical benefit for employee and family Working in a fast-paced, flexible, and multinational working environment. Chance to travel onsite (in 53 countries) Free snacks, refreshment, and parking Internal training (Technical & Functional & English) Working time: 8:30 AM - 6:00 PM from Mondays to Fridays  Why join ANZ? Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. That's why we strive to create balanced, sustainable economy in which everyone can take part and build a better life. By helping people make the most of what they have, we transform ideas, hard work and ambition into reality.  Career development means different things to different people. 128.job_description: Corporate Branding & Communication Team is a nice & kind bunch of people who is interested in HR [People] and also Marketing [Creativity & Logic] so end up working for the best of both worlds. The team and our mission, as the name suggests, build up the company image by telling the ‘why’ of VNG and inspire people to find their ‘why’. We are young, energetic and energized who love sharing, supporting, learning and embracing any challenges together. Join us & experience yourself!We are seeking a talented Creative Designer to join our team. This role focuses on the conceptual and aesthetic aspects of design projects, creating visually compelling solutions that align with our brand identity and effectively communicate our message.  What you will do: Concept Development: Generate creative ideas and concepts for branding, advertising, and marketing materials.  Graphic Design: Create visual content for print and digital media, such as brochures, posters, and banners.  Branding: Develop and maintain brand guidelines, ensuring consistency across all visual materials.  Visual Storytelling: Develop compelling narratives through visuals that align with the brand’s message and engage the target audience.  Trend Research: Stay updated on design trends and industry developments to incorporate fresh and modern aesthetics into projects.  Project Management: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to project specifications.  Collaborative Work: Work closely with CBC functional team and BUs to ensure designs align with strategic objectives  Yêu cầu ﻿Proven experience in graphic design and visual communication. Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Ai, After effect, Premiere, Light Room...). Experience in Ux/Ui design tool. Knowledge of color theory, typography, and layout. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.

130.job_description: We help the world run better At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.About SAP Labs Network and SAP Labs Vietnam SAP Labs Network is the global R&D setup where over 55,000 engineers around the world create, operate and support the most innovative enterprise solutions for SAP’s customers worldwide. SAP Labs Vietnam aims to become one of the key locations within the SAP Labs Network to support the engineering growth for SAP.Meet the team At SAP Procurement Product Team, our mission is to provide the world's leading cloud-based spend management solution, unifying the SAP Procurement portfolio across SAP S/HANA, SAP Ariba Applications & Business Network, and SAP Fieldglass. To strengthen further our team, we are looking for a skilled Developer with Data Science background to work with the leading cloud infrastructure in SAP Procurement Engineering teams  What you will do  Responsible for Design, Development & testing of cloud native applications Participate in code reviews, write unit tests, and perform integration testing to maintain code quality and reliability Push the frontiers of what is possible in the area of GenAl, Al and machine learning, working with real data. Explore, understand, and implement the most recent machine learning algorithms and approaches. Responsible for creating prototypes involving machine learning models to address business problems Capable of performing tasks and take decisions independently and ensure completion of tasks with good quality, timely delivery & efficiency What you should bring  5-10 years of relevant industry experience in product development Expert proficiency in Java w.r.t Spring Framework, Hibernate, Web Technologies and handling of data structures, SQL scripts Experience and understanding of micro services architecture Experience with CI/CD Tooling and software delivery and bundling mechanisms Experience with version control tools such as Git, Github Understanding of test driven development (TDD) Relevant experiences in data modeling and using data analytical tools and techniques (e.g., Python, SQL, Hadoop, R, Data Bricks) Intermediate understanding of databases such as SAP HANA, SQL Server, or Oracle Familiarity with statistical models and data mining algorithms Familiar with agile development methodology Bring out your best SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.We win with inclusion SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world. SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability: Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability. Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. Requisition ID: 397573 | Work Area: Software-Design and Development | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.

131.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 15 - 20 triệu VNĐ)Chịu trách nhiệm thực hiện xử lý các hạng mục liên quan đếnhình ảnh, thiết kế (Nhận diện thương hiệu, hình ảnh, video, ...) phục vụ công tác truyền thông dự án. Trao đổi/ làm việc trực tiếp và theo dõi đôn đốc tiến độ thực thi của đối tác/ đơn vị thực thi sản phẩm truyền thông, agency sản xuất. Nghiên cứu, đề xuất kế hoạch thiết kế quảng cáo, các chương trình quảng cáo ngoài trời để thúc đẩy bán hàng và xây dựng thương hiệu (brochure, flyer, poster, banner, standee). Lên ý tưởng thiết kế các vật phẩm, mẫu quảng cáo theo yêu cầu. Phác thảo các thông điệp quảng cáo,đóng góp ý kiến xây dựng các sản phẩm truyền thông phù hợp với tiêu chí công ty đề ra. Triển khai các kế hoạch thiết kế quảng cáo được duyệt. Quản lý các nhà cung ứng dịch vụ (agency) về thiết kế quảng cáo. Phối hợp với team marketing để đảm bảo các thiết kế đáp ứng mục tiêu truyền thông Nghiên cứu xu hướng thiết kế mới trong lĩnh vực bất động sản để áp dụng vào công việcChức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Mức lương thỏa thuận, cạnh tranh, phù hợp với năng lực Được đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN đầy đủ theo quy định của pháp luật Thưởng các ngày lễ tết, thưởng theo hiệu quả công việc và các phúc lợi khác theo quy chế của Công ty. Có cơ hội thăng tiến trong công ty Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, nhiều cơ hội học hỏi Được tham gia các hoạt động team building, du lịch hàng nămYêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Học vấn: Tốt nghiệpcử nhân Kinh nghiệm: Có2-3 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương. Kỹ năng:  Biết sử dụng các tính năng cơ bản tin học văn phòng Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ đồ họa chuyên ngành (Photoshop, AI, Corel, Indesign, After Effects) trong công việc. Tiếp nhận thông tin, tổng hợp, phân tích, nhận định tốt. Trình bày, thuyết phục và giao tiếp tốt. Khả năng làm việc nhóm, chịu áp lực cao. Có khả năng tư duy sáng tạo, thẩm mỹ tốt  Có kinh nghiệm về lĩnh vực bất động sản là một lợi thếYêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: Adobe Photoshop,Thiết Kế,Thiết Kế 2DTrung cấp - Nghề  Không yêu cầu

132.job_description: TechX is a trailblazer in cloud computing and data analytics, dedicated to empowering businesses in the banking, financial services, and enterprise sectors. Our flagship product, XData, revolutionizes data analytics by delivering advanced insights and innovative solutions that drive impactful outcomes.  Overview: The People Operations Specialist (HRX) will handle day-to-day HR operations and people-related tasks, manage employee records and benefits, ensure HR compliance, and support HR transformation (HRX) projects. This role also involves managing the Employee Engagement System (BASE), working on A.I & Analytics HR, and oversee internal digital communication channels.  Key Responsibilities:HR Operations:Manage day-to-day HR operations and people-related tasks efficiently. Maintain accurate and up-to-date employee records. Administer employee benefits and ensure compliance with HR policies.Employee Engagement System Management:Oversee the management of the Employee Engagement System (BASE). Ensure the system is user-friendly and effectively supports employee engagement.Project Management - AI HR:Assist with various HR projects as needed with a focus on A.I & Data Analytics Coordinate with different departments to ensure successful project execution.HR Transformation:Provide support for other talent management, including onboarding, performance management, recognition, well-being programs, and employee relations. Assist in the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures.Internal Digital Channel Management: Content Management: Work closely with HR, IT, Marketing, and freelancers to create, design, curate, and manage content across all internal digital platforms. Ensure content is engaging, relevant, and timely for each specific channel.  Platform Management:Oversee the management and optimization of the base, portal, email, and Telegram channels. Ensure all platforms are user-friendly, up-to-date, and effectively support communication objectives Key requirements:  Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. 2-3 years of experience in HR operations or as an HR generalist. Strong understanding of HR principles and practices. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to handle multiple tasks and projects simultaneously. Proficiency in HRIS and other HR-related software. Experience with internal communication platforms and content management is a plus.Key Skills:  Strong organizational and time management skills. Attention to detail and accuracy. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Analytical skills to track and report on KPIs. Adaptability and willingness to learn new tools and systems.What We Offer:  Innovative Environment: A dynamic and collaborative work environment where innovation is encouraged. Professional Growth: Opportunities for professional growth and development through continuous learning and exposure to cutting-edge technologies. Competitive Package: Competitive salary and benefits package Impactful Work: The chance to work on cutting-edge projects with industry-leading clients, making a tangible impact on their business success.  Apply now!  Due to the high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. We apologize for this inconvenience!

133.job: CV QUẢN TRỊ CƠ SỞ DỮ LIỆU (DBA)
133.job_description: Ngày: 1 thg 9, 2024 Mã số: 4291 Địa điểm làm việc: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, VN Khối: Công nghệ Thông tin  MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:Vị trí tuyển dụng Open level FRESHER / JUNIOR / SENIOR  TRÁCH NHIỆM CHÍNH  Cài đặt mới, cấu hình, cập nhật các bản vá lỗi phần mềm CSDL Oracle, SQL ServerCấu hình các giải pháp nâng cao tính sẵn sàng của hệ thống CSDL Oracle, SQL ServerCấu hình tính năng kiểm toán CSDL.Giám sát hiệu năng các hệ thống CSDL Oracle, SQL Server.Thiết lập các cảnh báo tự động cho hệ thống CSDL, gửi báo cáo hàng ngày tình trạng CSDL thông qua email, SMS.Hỗ trợ tinh chỉnh, tối ưu hóa các câu lệnh truy vấn chậm.Sử dụng tính năng phân vùng, nén, mã hóa dữ liệu trong CSDL giúp tăng hiệu năng, giảm dung lượng lưu trữ, nâng cao tính bảo mật hệ thống CSDL.Tham gia các dự án liên quan đến hệ thống CSDL Oracle, SQL Server.Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp quản lý.  YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC1. Bằng cấp/Chứng chỉ:Tốt nghiệp Đại học các chuyên ngành về công nghệ thông tin.Tiếng Anh: Không yêu cầu bằng cấp nhưng ứng viên phải có khả năng giao tiếp, hội họp và đọc hiểu thông thạo tài liệu chuyên ngành.2. Kiến thức/Kinh nghiệm chuyên môn:Có kinh nghiệm cài đặt, cấu hình, quản trị CSDL Oracle, SQL Server (Tối thiểu 03 năm kinh nghiệm quản trị CSDL đối với vị trí chuyên viên).Có kiến thức cơ bản về hệ điều hành Linux, AIX.Tuân thủ nghiêm ngặt quy trình vận hành hệ thống CSDL.Nắm vững và sử dụng thành thạo hệ điều hành Linux, AIX.Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm quản trị hệ thống CSDL Oracle Cloud hoặc tương đương.Ưu tiên có kiến thức về các hệ thống CSDL No-SQL, Big Data, AI, Machine learning.Ưu tiên có kiến thức nghiệm vận hành hệ thống máy chủ chuyên dụng Oracle Exadata.  "Cùng Sacombank bứt phá để thành công" CHẾ ĐỘ ĐÃI NGỘ:  Chế độ Lương và thu nhập hấp dẫn: các khoản thưởng vào nhiều dịp Lễ, Tết trong năm (thưởng tháng 13, thưởng danh hiệu theo cá nhân, thưởng kết quả hoạt động, kinh doanh của Đơn vị,…); Được đào tạo nghiệp vụ, kiến thức công việc liên quan; Cơ hội nghề nghiệp & lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng; Du lịch nghỉ mát hàng năm.

134.job_description: Roche fosters diversity, equity and inclusion, representing the communities we serve. When dealing with healthcare on a global scale, diversity is an essential ingredient to success. We believe that inclusion is key to understanding people’s varied healthcare needs. Together, we embrace individuality and share a passion for exceptional care. Join Roche, where every voice matters.  The Position We advance science so that we all have more time with the people we love.  As a member of Application team, you also play a key role to provide delight customer services via training, consulting and troubleshooting. You will work in close collaboration with customers and internal stakeholders including the sales, marketing teams…You take key role in As Quality Applications specialist, you will play a pivotal role in our Quality Applications specialists’ functional team. Your primary focus will be on performing and managing support programs and services for laboratory quality improvement, ensuring the alignment with global and regional frameworks as well as adapting to changing business requirements.Your Opportunity  Provide remote and on-site technical and troubleshooting support for patients and healthcare professionals, understanding their needs, and following all the systems and procedures established with a sense of urgency and customer centricity. Conduct operator and Applications/QC training for customers and internal staffs. Provide technical support in assigned projects/programs to improve laboratory quality, ensuring optimal utilization and alignment with business objectives; Participate in developing materials, documents and tools per request from internal and customers; actively contribute ideas/solutions to optimize business relevant information and work processes and to delight customer services. Collaborate with marketing team and stakeholders to deliver effective lab-quality-support programs. Ensures all activities are promptly and accurately key-in to Rexis in accordance with the specifications of the internal quality guidelines; Monitor and escalate the complaints, identify complex, intermittent or infrequent equipment failures. Manage complaints in cooperation with second level support, including communication with customers and colleagues. Support for in-house training, product demonstration, product evaluation/trials/study for key customers and reference sites. Present as service ambassador of Roche Diagnostic and build trust, connection with customers and internal stakeholders by strong and effective communication skills in Vietnamese and English.Who you are  Master / Bachelor’s Degree in either Health/Science/Medical Technology or related discipline from a recognized university. 2-3 years of relevant experience in clinical laboratories, prefer in quality management position. Experiences with cobas systems shall be added advantages. Experience with clinical quality management and quality certification/accreditation programs such as ISO 15189, Decision 2429, EQA programs, and CLSI guidelines shall be added advantages. Strong skill in data analytics, especially statistical analysis and method verification by MS excel or relevant statistic software (EP evaluator, Analyse-it…) shall be added advantages. Core competency including adaptability, continuous learning, leadership potential, critical thinking, initiative, collaboration, resilience, results-oriented mindset, creative problem solving, sense or urgency, time management, good communication skills, abilities to work as an independent contributor and as a team member are required. Other skills: presentation skill, data analyst skill, training skill, office skill, project management. Computer Skills: Microsoft Offices, Google Workspace, Statistic tools/ software Language: English and VietnameseWho we areAt Roche, more than 100,000 people across 100 countries are pushing back the frontiers of healthcare. Working together, we’ve become one of the world’s leading research-focused healthcare groups. Our success is built on innovation, curiosity and diversity.Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

135.job: NHÂN VIÊN THIẾT KẾ ĐỒ HỌA (GRAPHIC DESIGNER, HCM)
135.company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Viễn Thông FPT Telecom
135.job_description: Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Loại hình công việc: Toàn thời gian  Đơn vị quản lý: Ban MarketingMức lương: 12000000 - 18000000 VND  Hạn nộp hồ sơ: 19-09-2024  CHI TIẾT CÔNG VIỆC  Thiết kế các hình ảnh phục vụ cho Marketing online (website, fanpage, youtube, video ...), các ấn phẩm, vật phẩm phục vụ của hoạt động truyền thông của doanh nghiệp (banner, standee, băng rôn, ....). Thực hiện những TVC, Trailer, Video Clip theo yêu cầu của cấp trên có tính thẩm mỹ phù hợp Maketing Design dành cho những chiến dịch kinh doanh của công ty. Sử dụng phần mềm chỉnh sửa video để tạo ra sản phẩm cuối cùng một cách chuyên nghiệp. Thực hiện việc chỉnh sửa màu sắc, âm thanh, hiệu ứng đặc biệt và đồ họa chuyển động. Làm việc cùng quản lý để phát triển ý tưởng và kịch bản. Thực hiện quản lý file và lưu trữ đúng cách. Có thể chịu đựng áp lực khi làm việc ở cường độ cao, đúng deadline. Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm. Các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên.  YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC  Ưu tiên Ứng viên tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Thiết kế đồ hoạ, Graphic Design hoặc các ngành liên quan khác... Có it nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí Graphic Designer (lĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tin là một lợi thế). Sử dụng tốt các phần mềm thiết kế như: Adobe After Effects và Adobe Premiere Pro Adobe Illustrator (Ai), Adobe Photoshop (Ps), Adobe Indesign (In), Corel trung cấp trở lên... Sáng tạo, có kiến thức tốt về mỹ thuật và khả năng trình bày ý tưởng. Chịu được áp lực về chất lượng và bảo đảm tiến độ công việc, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao. Nắm bắt nhanh công việc.  QUYỀN LỢI  Gói thu nhập cạnh tranh (thưởng lương tháng 13, thưởng nghỉ mát....). Đầy đủ các chế độ theo luật lao động hiện hành. Chính sách phúc lợi theo quy định của Công ty đa dạng: Chăm sóc sức khỏe định kì hàng năm; Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe chuyên biệt (FPT Care – Khám chữa bệnh miễn phí tại tất cả các bệnh viện); Các hoạt động tri ân, chăm lo đời sống tinh thần CBNV và Thân nhân ... Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, cởi mở. Cơ sở vật chất và công cụ làm việc hiện đại, tiện nghi. Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến. 141.job_description: Hồ Chí Minh  Full-timeWhat you will doWork with cross-funtional team to identify, implement and roll out product growth initiatives; Develop the strategies and tactics to capture the value of opportunities to accelerate customer acquisition, grow engagement, and increase usage frequency; Build products which focus on acquisition, retention, and reengagement of users; Develop and execute A/B Tests to further accelerate the growth of daily user interactions; Use data to inform decisions around user growth; Track funnel metrics to improve product improvement; Drive innovation, definition, roadmap and design of entirely new experiences across the product.  What you will needBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or related field; 4+ years of experience in product management or product marketing; Superior analytical and quantitative skills; experience in model building, testing and validation; Strong data-driven and have keen eye of user insights/ user experience; Experience working with a cross-functional team; Ability to dive deep in understanding the product, business, and the competitive landscape; Excellent written and verbal communications.

142.job_description: This is a career-defining opportunity to be a member of a tech startup that is implementing an end-to-end solution that will power the future of data science and data engineering. As our Senior Product Designer, you will build intuitive user-driven experiences for the company ’s SaaS products. You will leverage user testing, UX, UI, and product design best practices to create a world-class user experience for data scientists and AI engineers. Your Impact  Design and define the design system for the comapny's core products. Translate complex and abstract concepts into usable and intuitive human-first products to power the future of AI engineering Execute the necessary assignments of each stage of the design-thinking process to inform the UX and UI decisions Fuel design ideas and stories through a holistic view of the objectives of the different teams and market research Empower humidity through your product design Collaborate with product managers, developers, and data scientists to define and execute workflows. RequirementsFundamental knowledge of digital product design, including color, typography, layout, component management, accessibility. Ability to iterate and ship products quickly in fast pacing startup environments. Experience with building software products Ability to manage and take complete ownership of projects, while gathering valuable input from team members and customers. Excellent written, verbal, and visual communication skills, and the ability to eloquently defend design ideas in executive and peer-review meetings. Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail Proficiency in Figma and experience with Illustrator/Photoshop or equivalent tools. Ability to prototype quickly to communicate your ideas using Figma Prototype,Principle, AfterEffects, or any tool of your choice. Work from anywhere in the world but expect to overlap at least a few hours a day with Pacific Standard Time. Fundamental knowledge of HTML/CSS/Tailwind is a plus Familiarity with SaaS business models is a plus

144.job_description: Chi Doanh - CB/I Digital are looking for an excellent, proven candidate in the product manager role, who has strong experience in product UX, product marketing and task management skills to get our product to market. JOB DESCRIPTION  As a Product Manager for Conative.ai, you will collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to create world-class experiences for our client's brands. The suitable candidate will be responsible for:  Developing a product feature plan that addresses our clients’ current and future needs. Figuring out customers’ pain points and preferences. Managing the product roadmap based on customer needs and market research, users feedback, customer usage as well as competitive analysis. Writing clear and concise product specifications that include users stories, business rules, flows, interaction design guidance, and use cases. Measuring and reporting on the adoption and impact of new and existing features; using data to recommend improvements.BENEFITS  As a PM for Conative, you will enjoy:  A competitive salary, starting from $1,000 (negotiable, based on candidates’ qualifications) 13th month salary and a bonus based on the performance Overtime pay according to company policy (x1.5 for weekdays, x2 for weekends) Social insurance, health insurance and other benefits in accordance with the Labor Law and the Company policies PLUS PTI premium insurance Annual company trips An excellent “learning hub” from leading industry experts and build world-class products A dynamic, transparent, and professional work environment An opportunity to improve your English language and communication skillsREQUIREMENT  As a product manager for Conative.AI, you will need to have:  Knowledge of:  Product management principles Data analytics B2B marketing SaaS products Business analysis Experiences in:  2+ years of exp as a Project Manager for a digital (ideally B2B SaaS) product Working with PMs, designers, and engineers…and all stakeholders Coordinating cross-functional teams Solving grand challenges & being comfortable with organized chaos Using insights to make data driven decisions Leadership & teamwork skills Can-do attitude with:  A deep understanding of product management A passion for creating exceptional products that solve customer needs A problem-solving mindset that drives you to find the root cause and develop an appropriate solution An entrepreneurial spirit that enables you to take ownership, operate well in ambiguity, and get things done Studious and curious attitude at work Analytical thinking Open mindset Must-have Skills:  Excellent communication (both written and verbal) Planning & Presentation Solving problems Project management Time management Team management

146.job_description: VNG Solutions is a subsidiary of VNG Corporation, a reputable Vietnamese provider of IT services and technology on a global scale. With its key markets in the Middle East, the US, and Europe, VNG Solutions' headquarters in Vietnam is dedicated to providing enterprise-level services and empowering customers and society to advance decisively into the digital future.  VNG Solutions provides top-notch services while strictly adhering to international standards. We remain in the public eye as experts in "the next big technologies”. VNG Solutions will provide you with a creative environment with an emphasis on B2B services, where you will have the opportunity to foster your abilities and learn about various technologies to advance your career. ﻿Perform manual, automation and API software testing. Execute and evaluate manual test cases to locate bugs and regressions and ensure product quality is of a high standard. Develop, document, and maintain functional and non-functional test cases, test reports and test plans. Work closely with the development team to design testing strategies. Perform all phases of testing including functional, system and regression testing. Participate in peer review and inspect requirement documents. Prepare test data and environment as needed to complete testing assignments. Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents. Ensure that validated deliverables meet functional and design specifications and requirements. Track and control testing progress and report any quality problems/issues of the project. Propose a solution to improve the product. Keep updated with new testing tools and test strategies. Yêu cầuBachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field. 3+ years of hands-on experience in QC role. Experience with both white box and black box testing. Experience in writing new test cases based on requirements. Integration Test and developing test cases, test plan. Experience with Selenium or Robot Framework Experience with tools such as JMeter, Postman is preferred. Have knowledge of databases (SQL, MongoDB). Experience with object-oriented languages such as: JavaScript Good knowledge of software development methodologies. Experience in applying test techniques on projects. Write test cases and report bugs clearly Experience with Agile/Scrum development process Familiar with Bug tracker such as Jira, TestRail... Proficiency in English

147.job_description: Chi Doanh - CB/I Digital is seeking for an experienced Content Creator who will be responsible for producing high-quality content in both English and Vietnamese and utilizing their exceptional writing skills and creativity. JOB DESCRIPTIONCreate SEO-optimized content in English and Vietnamese across various formats, including:Blog posts, Articles, Product descriptions, Landing pages, Category pages Conduct keyword research Create content at scale, managing a high volume of assignments Optimize content structure, headings, meta descriptions, and tags that meet SEO standards Monitor and analyze content performance using tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to identify improvement opportunities Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithms, and best practices to ensure content remains competitive Collaborate with the SEO and marketing teams to develop and implement content strategies aligned with project goals.BENEFITSA competitive salary depending on your level of expertise A dynamic, transparent, and professional work environment Social insurance, health insurance and other benefits in accordance with the Labor Law and the Company policies PLUS PTI premium insurance An annual company trip A possibility for an early salary raise with solid contribution A 13th month salary and a bonus based on the performance Overtime pay according to company policy (x1.5 for weekdays, x2 for weekends) Flexible work hours. Collaborative work environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation Access to industry-leading SEO tools and resources Opportunities for professional development by joining big enterprise project in both Vietnam and US Mentorship from experienced content creators and SEO experts Exposure to a wide range of industries and topics to enhance your writing versatility.REQUIREMENTRequired Qualifications  Native-level proficiency in Vietnamese and professional working proficiency in English Experience with keyword research and content optimization techniques Familiarity with any SEO tools (such as Google Analytics, Search Console, or Ahrefs) Good at writing, editing, and proofreading skills Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex information clearly and persuasively. Preferred Qualifications  Proven experience in creating SEO-focused content that drives organic traffic. Experience using AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, or Claude to streamline content creation and optimization processes is a big plus Familiarity with WordPress or other content management systems Understanding of internal link building and SEO tactics Good at time management and organizational skills Knowledge of HTML and basic web publishing. Những câu hỏi thường gặp Kỹ năng và chuyên môn cần có ở một chuyên gia SEO Content?Để trở thành một chuyên gia SEO Content, bạn cần phát triển một loạt kỹ năng và kiến thức chuyên môn quan trọng:  1. Hiểu biết về seo:  Nắm vững các nguyên tắc cơ bản của seo, bao gồm tối ưu hóa trang web (on-page seo), xây dựng liên kết (off-page seo), và tối ưu hóa kỹ thuật. 2. Nghiên cứu từ khóa:  Học cách sử dụng công cụ nghiên cứu từ khóa để tìm ra những từ khóa phù hợp với mục tiêu của doanh nghiệp và khách hàng mục tiêu. 3. Viết lách chất lượng:  Phát triển kỹ năng viết lách để tạo ra nội dung hấp dẫn, thông tin và tối ưu cho seo. 4. Phân tích đối thủ:  Nghiên cứu và phân tích chiến lược nội dung của đối thủ cạnh tranh để hiểu được những gì họ đang làm và làm thế nào bạn có thể làm tốt hơn. 5. Hiểu biết về content marketing:  Nắm vững cách thức tiếp thị nội dung và cách nó tích hợp với các chiến lược seo tổng thể. 6. Sử dụng công cụ seo:  Trở nên thành thạo với các công cụ seo như google analytics, semrush, ahrefs, hoặc moz để theo dõi hiệu suất và cải thiện chiến lược nội dung của bạn. 7. Cập nhật xu hướng mới:  Luôn cập nhật với các xu hướng mới trong seo và marketing nội dung để nội dung của bạn không lỗi thời. 8. Thực hành liên tục:  Seo là một lĩnh vực thay đổi nhanh chóng, vì vậy việc thực hành liên tục và thử nghiệm mới là cách tốt nhất để học hỏi và cải thiện.

148.job: TRỢ LÝ ĐÀO TẠO 1-ALL STARS FULLTIME
148.job_description: Giới thiệu: Tiền thân là 1 trong những công ty sản xuất phim hàng đầu ​Việt Nam từ 2015, chúng tôi hiểu rằng video và phim ảnh là ​cách tốt nhất để giải trí và ảnh hưởng đến khán giả. Nhưng ​ngày nay ai cũng phải thay đổi cách tiếp cận khi NHÀ SÁNG ​TẠO NỘI DUNG (Creators) là nguồn trực tiếp tự tạo ra nội ​dung (CONTENTS) để GIAO TIẾP (COMMUNICATION) với ​khán giả.Vì vậy, 1-ALL STARS cung cấp 1 nền tảng thương mại hóa ​để tìm kiếm, ươm mầm và hỗ trợ các Nhà Sáng Tạo Nội ​Dung và Tài Năng tiềm năng để ai Nội dung công việcTrợ giảng quản lý lớp học: sắp lịch học,liên hệ giảng viên, điểm danh, nhắc nhở học viện đi học, điều phối giờ giấc học/giờ giấc nghỉ giải lao, chuẩn bị tài liệu lớp học, ghi nhận feedback… Trả lời thắc mắc học viên, người đăng ký học.. Tư vấn học viên trực tiếp khoá học tại công ty, qua hotline và các trang social Tìm kiếm/Soạn hay tự quay chụp nội dung đăng bài quảng bá khoá học và trực trang social của công ty mỗi ngày Phụ trách các chương trình quảng bá cho khoá học: workshop, hay livestream, hay webminar. Phối hợp với các phòng ban khác (phòng tài chính, phòng admin...khi cần thiết) để tổ chức các sự kiện này Xem xét các kế hoạch chạy quảng cáo Facebook Ads/TIktok Ads/giám sát kết quả hằng ngày và đề xuất hành động cụ thể với giám đốc chương trình để kết quả quảng cáo hiệu quả: ít tiền và tuyển được đủ học viên.  Yêu cầuKhông yêu cầu kinh nghiệm. Phù hợp với các bạn tốt nghiệp hoặc sinh viên định hướng theo ngành truyền thông, social, quản lý nghệ sĩ, sân khấu điện ảnh... giúp tạo dựng connection mảng phim, diễn viên. Hướng phát triển mảng quản lý nghệ sĩ hoặc quản lý xây dựng mảng đào tạo KOL/KOC/Influencer. Có ngoại hình, có khả năng giao tiếp Kỹ năng mềm: Giao tiếp, Siêng năng, chịu được áp lực công việc, kỹ năng quản lý thời gian tốt. Kỹ năng quản lý, sắp xếp thời gian - quản lý giảng viên/lớp học. Kỹ năng giao tiếp, teamwork. Kỹ năng: quay/chụp hình cho social bằng điện thoại, chỉnh ảnh/dựng phim bằng điện thoại... Kinh nghiệm: sử dụng Excel, thiết kế Canva, power Point, Word, Tiktok, Capcut, phần mềm chỉnh ảnh trên điện thoại... Google doc - Google calendar – Email Có máy tính laptop và điện thoại smartphone có thể quay chụp tối thiểu chuẩn FullHD.  Quyền lợiThưởng KPIs từ 5-10% tổng doanh thu khoá học. Chia hoa hồng nếu kêu gọi được đối tác tài trợ, nhãn hàng quảng cáo. Được học các khoá đào tạo của công ty nếu cam kết làm việc tối thiểu 1 năm. Phụ cấp nếu làm thêm các dự án quay chụp/dự án Tiktok series hay nhãn hàng.  Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 6000K - 12000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Chế độ bảo hiểm, Cơ Hội Thăng Tiến, Hoa hồng Hạn nộp: 2024-09-07 Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc Bằng cấp: Trung cấp Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Tư vấn - CSKH;Dịch vụ -Giáo dục, Đào tạo;Hành chính/ Nhân sự -Hành chính/ Văn phòng Số lượng cần tuyển: 2 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

150.job_description: Job Brief As a QC engineer, your responsibilities cover for writing and executing manual test cases as well as specialized testing covering the one or more areas of: UI, API, security, system performance, database testing, network/protocol analysis, and installation/configuration. Responsibilities  Ensure the assigned tasks to be performed on-time and with high quality. Investigate and analyze the project requirements. Create/Modify test-related artifacts (test cases, test report, test plans) Participate in peer review and inspect requirement documents (test case, user guide, admin guide) Prepare test data and environment as needed to complete testing assignments Perform testing (functional, regression, sanity, security, performance,…) Analyze problems and complete detailed reports Track the defect into bug tracking tools Support development team to reproduce the bugs Be able to learn/self-investigate new knowledge To be able to mentor junior staffs. Weekly and/or on-demand report to supervisor. Strictly follow the project and organization processes, policies and regulations.  Requirements  Bachelor degree in computer science or equivalent. At least 01-year experience in working with enterprise products. Able to work independently, and cooperate well with internal and external teams to get the jobs done with high quality. Familiar with using one of project management tools such as Jira, Redmine, MS Team, etc. Good analytical thinking and how to determine the root cause of the issue/problem. Proactive, carefulness, detailed, well self-organized and responsible in work. Good at time management skill, communication skill, problem solving skill, and presentation skill.  About VSL VSL is a global software solution and software consulting company which provides a wide range of services including full cycle software development, agile testing, and software consulting. Our expertise includes, but is not limited to, emerging technologies such as e-commerce, blockchain, cryptocurrency, fintech, and bots, etc. Job Features  Job Category  Business Analyst, Engineering, Mobile, QC

152.job_description: are you well-suited to this role?A data geek? A person who can manage huge volumes of data? Committed to being organized?  YES?  Then this is a great opportunity for you!where your passion will be Fulfilled  We fully entrust you with these responsibilities:  Develop data architecture and modeling to ensure that the data architecture and model are optimized and aligned closely with business goals. Design and build Cubes in SQL Server Analysis Services. Monitor, maintain, and enhance the data warehouse along with business intelligence systems performance, availability, and integrity. Provide corrective and preventive maintenance as required. Develop and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) routines according to the data warehouse design and architecture in SQL Server. Collect and harmonize data from different sources and reporting results based on end-user requirements. Troubleshoot data warehouse issues including hardware and software. Investigate and resolve data loading and data integrity issues to ensure data accuracy, permissions, and security configurations. Maintain relationships with users to identify and develop additional data sources for the data warehouse to keep it consistent with business rules and customer needs. Participate as a team member in data warehouse projects.Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned by CTO or Director/Unit Head.  your qualifications and skills  Experience with Microsoft Data Warehousing & BI solutions. Knowledge of data warehousing and modeling methods, techniques, standards and procedures. Ability to independently extract and analyze data. Understanding of data lake concepts, data visualizations, etc. Abilities in the field of large data handling through data manipulation and ETL tools. Fluent in systems, SQL queries, and relational databases. Good verbal/written communication and interpersonal skills. Familiar with Agile software development environment. Experience in data processing and transformation. Effective time management and prioritization skills. Up-to-date on latest data and system best practices.  BONUS POINTS  Data Mining experience is a plus.  Bachelor’s degree in IT/Computer Science/Information Systems or equivalent hands-on experience in software companies. At least 2+ years of proven experience in Data Warehouse Specialist position. Good command of written and spoken English.  what you will enjoyCompetitive SalaryRewards & RecognitionsPremium HealthcareMeals & RefreshmentsTransparent Career PathTeam-building ActivitiesSport Facilities  where you will be working at SMS Tower  Lot 40, Quang Trung Software City, Tan Chanh Hiep Ward, District 12, Ho Chi Minh City

Flexible working time Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices, and soft skills Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building,... Fitness & sports activities: football, tennis, table tennis, badminton, yoga,... Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge, charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,.. Free in-house entertainment facilities (foosball, ping pong, gym,...), coffee (latte, cappuccino, espresso,...) and snack (instant noodles, cookies, candies,..) 155.job_description: Giới thiệu: Bếp Xuyên Việt là thương hiệu chuyên cung cấp các loại xốt ướp sẵn, giúp người dùng có thể nấu ăn ngon một cách tiện lợi và nhanh chóng. Công ty cam kết mang đến các sản phẩm chất lượng, an toàn và hữu ích, nhằm trở thành người bạn đồng hành đáng tin cậy cho mọi gia đình Việt. Nội dung công việc Sáng tạo nội dung: videos, infographics, images, text, livestream... (content videos là một lợi thế) Render các hình ảnh phục vụ cho việc làm thumbnail Tìm hiểu về các công cụ render AI mới phục vụ cho công việc Chỉnh sửa hình ảnh sau khi render Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 6000K - 12000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Môi Trường Chuyên Nghiệp, Môi Trường Năng động, Phụ cấp ăn uống, Đào Tạo Miễn Phí Hạn nộp: 2024-09-06 Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc Bằng cấp: Đại học Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Marketing Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

156.job_description: Hồ Chí Minh  Full-timeWhat you will doAnalyze market best practices and user behavior to derive insightful information and understand user needs and challenges; Develop a content distribution strategy based on product positioning to enhance the user experience in consuming short videos; Create user flows and experiments to iterate on and develop new and existing features based on user scenarios, business value, technical feasibility, and recommendation approaches; Drive the development of machine learning, AI, and recommendation-based solutions for product and feature optimization strategies; Partner closely with other teams, including Content Operations, Engineering,and Data Science, to deliver content distribution features.  What you will needA Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related applied field; At least 3 years of experience in product management and optimization; Domain knowledge in recommendations and experience in a big data environment, with direct interaction with data scientists and/or machine learning engineers, is highly desirable; Ability to balance between data-driven and product sense in decision-making process; Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to provide strategic solutions; Results-oriented, self-starting, and possessing a strong sense of ownership; Robust quantitative and qualitative reasoning skills, along with strong logical and critical thinking abilities; Passion for the media and entertainment industry, especially the short video market.

157.job_description: We help the world run better  At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.About SAP Labs Network and SAP Labs Vietnam SAP Labs Network is the global R&D setup where over 55,000 engineers around the world create, operate and support the most innovative enterprise solutions for SAP’s customers worldwide. SAP Labs Vietnam aims to become one of the key locations within the SAP Labs Network to support the engineering growth for SAP. What you’ll do As a Development Architect, you will work with Product Managers, UX Designers, Developers and Quality Engineers in an agile scrum environment to accelerate innovations for Supply Chain Collaboration and expand the SAP Business Network. You will have the opportunity to work on complex business problems and build solutions on the SAP Business Technology Platform with Java, SAP CAP/CDS, SAP Fiori Elements, SAP UI5, and SAP HANA. To succeed in this position, you must be able to:  Provide technical leadership for key component areas of the largest business network in the cloud (think 24x7x365, millions of users, terabytes of data) Have high standards on usability, scalability, resiliency, and security and hold the same standards for fellow engineers. Demonstrate strong technical, business, and methodological leadership. Internalize business requirements and solve them with beautifully engineered solutions. Take initiatives and drive topics to resolution. Mentor junior and senior developers and help the team succeed.What you bring  Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering or a related field. 7+ years of development experience developing and maintaining production grade software (5+ years for Master’s). 2+ years of experience working on cloud-based or on-demand software solutions. Excellent OOD, Java, and SQL skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. Experience with REST/XML/JSON, Kafka, Spring Boot, Maven, Jenkins, GitHub. Experience working with Unix/Linux environments. Experience with cloud technologies such as AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, etc. Experience with SAP technologies such as BTP, CAP/CDS, Fiori Elements/UI5, Kyma, HANA, S4/HANA a plus but not required. Domain knowledge in Supply Chain a plus but not required.  Meet your team The SAP Business Network Supply Chain Collaboration team is one of the fastest growing teams within the SAP Business Network, the largest business-to-business network in the world with over 3.6 million connected companies in over 190 countries. Our solution enables customers to manage and run an efficient supply chain and helps them collaborate with direct materials suppliers through innovative planning and execution processes. We are looking for bright engineers who are passionate about solving complex business problems with purposeful, beautiful software, and have fun while doing it.#SAPLabsVietnamCareersBring out your best SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.  We win with inclusion SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world. SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability: Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability. Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. Requisition ID: 397292 | Work Area: Software-Design and Development | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: #LI-Hybrid.

158.company: SẢN XUẤT VÀ THƯƠNG MẠI KỆ SẮT ANT
158.job_description: Giới thiệu: Kệ Sắt ANT tự hào là nhà cung cấp uy tín các loại kệ sắt đa dạng, đáp ứng mọi nhu cầu lưu trữ của bạn. Với đội ngũ chuyên gia giàu kinh nghiệm và dây chuyền sản xuất hiện đại, chúng tôi cam kết mang đến cho khách hàng MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Phát triển nội dụng quảng cáo trên các kênh social (Facebook, instargram, tiktok, youtube,...) Biên soạn và lên kế hoạch thiết kế nội dung cho công ty. Design hình ảnh truyền thông cho khách hàng. Tham gia xây dựng kế hoạch, đóng góp ý tưởng nội dung. Thực hiện báo cáo tiến độ và kết quả định kỳ. YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC Có khả năng viết . Có kinh nghiệm là một lợi thế. Biết sử dụng phần mềm Ai, Ps, Power Point.... Hiểu biết cơ bản về nền tảng social media đối với ngành hàng, có khả năng viết lách về sản phẩm kệ sắt cũng là một lợi thế. Có Laptop để làm việc. Có khả năng chịu áp lực công việc, sáng tạo, có tinh thần trách nhiệm Đáp ứng thời gian làm việc tối thiểu 6 buổi/tuần từ Thứ 2 - Thứ 6 (được đăng kí thời gian làm việc). QUYỀN LỢI Được training cụ thể về phương pháp viết Content chuẩn, kỹ năng thiết kế hình ảnh, cách viết lách hiệu quả. Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, hoà đồng. Được hỗ trợ dấu mộc xác nhận thực tập. Được hỗ trợ đào tạo khóa học chuyên sâu về Digital Marketing (Facebook Ads, Google Ads,..). Có cơ hội thăng tiến thành partner chính thức. Được đăng kí lịch làm linh hoạt theo lịch học. - Hồ sơ yêu cầu: Sơ yếu lý lịch (được xác nhận bởi công an ở địa phương); Đơn xin việc; Bằng photo bằng tốt nghiệp trung cấp, cao đẳng, đại học; Giấy khai sinh và giấy khám sức khỏe của mẹ; 02 ảnh 3×4, chứng minh nhân dân (photo). Chứng chỉ văn bằng khác (nếu có); Bản tóm tắt quá trình học tập, kinh nghiệm công tác tại đơn vị cũ. Địa điểm làm việc: TPHCM Lương: 2000K - 4000K VND một tháng Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian  Yêu cầu: Quyền lợi: Thưởng Tháng 13, Đào Tạo Miễn Phí Hạn nộp: 2024-09-27 Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc Bằng cấp: Không yêu cầu Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Marketing Số lượng cần tuyển: 1 Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

159.company: Cong Ty Co Phan Dich Vu Giao Hang Nhanh
159.job_description: ABOUT US As part of Vietnam’s fast growing e-commerce ecosystem since 2012, we have become the leading integrated logistics provider for millions of merchants and consumers, while creating thousands of jobs in the new economy. Our core strengths are nationwide network, operational excellence, and technology capacity. We are obsessed about delivering faster, cheaper and smarter experiences to our customers across all products and services. Our vision is to become the operating system of Vietnam’s digital commerce.  YOU WILL  Experiences to prepare test plans, test data, etc. Creating detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test cases. Write test scripts to manual test cases and scenarios for mobile and/or web applications, API. Write a checklist test. Execute all relevant testing types for the story, including user interface testing, functionality testing, performance testing, regression testing, or integration testing. Creating & managing bug reports and communicating with the other team. Make improvements to the functionality, design, and usability of the product.YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEAt least 3 years of practical experience in Software Testing or a similar role. Experience in working with Web, Mobile, API Testing. Especially Mobile testing. Have experience in black box testing. Good understanding of product management/development. Solid oral and written communications skills. Excellent attention to detail. (required). A QC has a mindset towards consumer products (required). Bachelor's Degree in Information System, Computer Science, or related fields.  WHY YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE  Top 3 Logistic companies in Vietnam. Fair team. Annual health check-ups. 13th salary. PVI Care. Performance bonus Comfortable Private working Area for TECH team. Sports club: Running, football, badminton. Open communication with Senior Engineer & Technical Leader. Challenging working environment with the attractive domain as Logistics. Specific pantry with nice decoration & Coffee/Milk Coffee/Chocolate & Tea. Comfortable Private working Area for TECH team. Annual Team-building + Outing trip. Join Training Courses and Tech Sharing. Mid-Autumn Party, Christmas party, Year-end Party. With the delivery network covering more than 98% geographical area of Vietnam, you will be welcome anywhere in Vietnam for traveling.

160.job_description: Job Function: Software & Cloud Services The role:Data Engineer requirements: Design, Deploy, and maintain solutions on MS Azure using different Cloud & Big Data Technologies. Manage the full life cycle of a Data Lake / Big Data solutions from requirement gathering and analysis to platform selection, design of the architecture, and deployment. Be responsible for implementing solutions that can scale on Cloud. Collaborate with a team of business domain experts, data scientists, and application developers to develop BD solutions. Explore and learn new technologies for creative business problem solving and mentor a team of Data Engineers.  Power BI requirements: Understand business requirements in BI context and design data models to transform raw data into meaningful insights. Convert business requirements into technical specifications and decide timeline to accomplish. Create dashboards and interactive visual reports using Power BI Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) with clear objectives and consistently monitor them. Analyzing data and present data through reports that aid decision-making Create relationships between data and develop tabular and other multidimensional data models. Chart creation and data documentation explaining algorithms, parameters, models, and relations. Design, develop, test, and deploy Power BI scripts and perform detailed analytics. Perform DAX queries and functions in Power BI Analyze current ETL process, define and design new systems. Redefine and make technical/strategic changes to enhance existing Business Intelligence systems. Create customize charts and custom calculations as per requirements. SQL querying for best results, use of filters and graphs for better understanding of data Work with users and team members at all levels for performance improvement and suggestions  What we need to see from you: Strong Hands-on experience in implementing Data Lake with technologies like – Azure Data Factory (ADF), Azure Synapse, ADLS, Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, SQL Database, Power BI, Azure ML, Azure Databricks Strong programming & debugging skills either in SQL, Python and Scala/Java. Experience in building REST services is good to have. Experience in supporting Data Science teams in consuming the data in a secure and governed manner. Experience deploying Machine Learning solutions into production commercial environments. Good, understand, and Experience of using CI/CD with Git, Jenkins / Azure DevOps. Understanding of branching strategies, pull requests, and code reviews. Experience in setting up cloud-computing infrastructure solutions (in Dev Environment). Experience in using NoSQL Databases and Data Modelling in Hive  Why SoftwareOne?:Hear firsthand from SoftwareOne APAC leaders as they unveil our exciting business and growth plan, spill the beans on our hiring initiatives, and reveal why joining SoftwareOne is a game-changer. Join us now and be part of our incredible journey. Accommodations:SoftwareOne welcomes applicants from all backgrounds and abilities to apply. If you require reasonable adjustments at any point during the recruitment process, email us at reasonable.accommodations@softwareone.com.Please include the role for which you are applying and your country location. Someone from our organization that is not part of the decision-making process will be in touch to discuss your specific needs and we will make every effort to accommodate you. Any information shared will be stored securely and treated in the strictest of confidence in line with GDPR.

161.company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Đầu Tư Biểu Tượng Vàng
161.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: 8 - 15 triệu VNĐ)Chịu trách nhiệm thiết kế, quản lý và phát triển các sản phẩm thiết kế của Công ty. Thiết kế các ấn phẩm đồ họa, các mẫu quảng cáo, brochure, banner ... Chụp ảnh, chỉnh sửa, quay video, cho các sự kiện của thương hiệu, sự kiện nội bộ của công ty; Cùng triển khai các chương trình Marketing/PR cho các sự kiện, chiến dịch của công ty; Chỉnh sửa, hoàn thiện sản phẩm và các công việc khác theo yêu cầu; Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của cấp trênChức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Làm việc trong môi trường vô cùng thoải mái, năng động và được khuyến khích tự do sáng tạo và thử nghiệm cái mới. Lương thưởng thỏa thuận xứng đáng theo năng lực. Được làm việc trực tiếp với Ban lãnh đạo, cùng những người có kinh nghiệm, tư duy chiến lược và sáng tạo. Được cung cấp các trang thiết bị hiện đại cần thiết để nâng cao hiệu quả làm việc. Được hưởng đầy đủ các chính sách BHXH, BHYT, các phúc lợi khác theo đúng quy định của Luật lao động và các chế độ đãi ngộ của Công ty.Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề  Yêu cầu công việc:  Ít nhất 6 tháng kinh nghiệm ở vị trí Thiết kế, đồ họa Sử dụng thành thạo Photoshop, AI, canva, phần mềm chỉnh sửa video và các công cụ hỗ trợ khác; Khả năng mỹ thuật tốt, tính năng động, sáng tạo, giàu ý tưởng và có tư duy sáng tạo logic và luôn chủ động trong công việc; Ưu tiên ứng viên biết quay + dựng video.Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: Adobe Photoshop,Thiết Kế,Thiết Kế 2DTrung cấp - Nghề  Dưới 1 năm

162.company: Công Ty TNHH Hunter Macdonald Việt Nam
162.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)  About the role Netcompany is currently looking for ambitious graduates to join us on a permanent basis to drive forward our delivery capability and deliver the optimum solutions to our clients in Europe. You will join our strong and dedicated team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to work with some of the most skilled IT consultants in Vietnam and our technically skilled employees in Europe. As an employee in Netcompany you will also benefit from our large and global knowledge-based communities, Centers of Excellence. This covers a wide range of different knowledge groups, from specific technologies like .NET and Java to Architecture, Security and AI to name a few. Combined, they offer the chance to learn from the best across our different countries. Job Description • Analyze and understand business and technical requirements and work with clients across different domains and industries• Produce high-quality design deliverables that describes how the solution will accommodate business and technical requirements• Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using best practices• Conduct continuous unit and manual testing and deliver high quality solutions• Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to troubleshoot and address issues• Work and collaborate in an agile international environment with experienced and skilled colleagues in Vietnam and Europe• Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner • Identify areas for own personal development Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Môi trường làm việc dân chủ, hiện đại, chuyên nghiệp, có cơ hội thăng tiến và ổn định lâu dài. Được đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN theo quy định của nhà nước. Được hưởng chế độ chăm sóc sức khỏe toàn diện. Được hưởng các quyền lợi khác theo chính sách của công tyYêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học  Yêu cầu công việc: • Bachelor's or Master's degree within a relevant IT specialization • Good English skills both in writing and verbally • Basic understanding of and practical experience with object-oriented programming and data modelling • Familiar with various design, architectural patterns and modern system development • Open towards and able to quickly learn new technologies • Ability to work both independently and collaboratively as part of an international team • Professional pro-active attitude, taking responsibility and initiative• Effectively estimate work and produce deliverables on time Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ  Ngành nghề: CNTT - Phần Mềm,Java,PHPĐại Học  Không yêu cầu

163.job_description: RECURVETầng 9, Tòa nhà International Plaza, Số 343 Đ. Phạm Ngũ Lão, Phường Phạm Ngũ Lão, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh , District 1, Ho Chi Minh  Hybrid Posted 12 days agoSkills: Automation Test Python QA QC Top 3 reasons to join us  Build AI-powered data platform for global markets International, diverse work environment 15 days of annual leave  Job description  Test Strategy: Develop and maintain test plans, test cases, and automated test scripts to validate the functionality, performance, and security of the Recurve platform. Test Execution: Thoroughly execute test cases, analyze results, and accurately document and track defects through resolution. Automation: Design and implement automated tests using appropriate tools and frameworks to improve testing efficiency and coverage. Performance Testing: Conduct performance and load testing to identify bottlenecks, optimize platform performance, and ensure scalability. Security Testing: Collaborate with security teams to perform vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to protect against potential threats. Data Integrity: Develop and maintain processes to ensure the accuracy, completeness, and consistency of data within the platform. Collaboration: Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements, prioritize testing efforts, and provide timely feedback. Continuous Improvement: Continuously evaluate and enhance quality control processes, methodologies, and tools to adapt to evolving requirements.  Your skills and experience  Experience: 3+ years of hands-on experience in quality control or software testing roles, preferably with data platforms or enterprise software. Technical Skills: Strong understanding of software testing principles and methodologies (e.g., black-box, white-box testing). Experience with test automation tools and frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, JUnit). Knowledge of performance and load testing tools (e.g., JMeter, Gatling). Familiarity with SQL and data validation techniques. Familiarity with Python and pytest Problem-Solving: Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills with meticulous attention to detail. Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams. Self-Direction: Ability to work independently, manage multiple tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with cloud-based infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP). Knowledge of data governance principles and practices. Exposure to generative AI technologies or machine learning concepts.  Why you'll love working here  Encouragement of a self-driven, results-oriented work culture Competitive salary 13th-month salary 15 days of annual leave Full social insurance coverage and premium healthcare benefits Annual health check-up Monthly Team Outing, Company Trip, Year End Party and Events RECURVE  RECURVECompany type IT ProductCompany industry  Software Development Outsourcing Company size 1-50 employeesCountryVietnam  Working days Monday - FridayOvertime policy No OT

164.company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Digiex Group
164.job_description: Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)  About us: DigiEx Group is a leading Technology Company based in Vietnam. Our innovative IT solutions have added value to businesses worldwide and focus on performance, with more than 7 years of experience in providing quality software development, Cloud Migration, and Digital Transformation Solutions for global clients such as the US, UK, Japan, Singapore, and Korea. DigiEx Group develops strategic software solutions for businesses across the globe. Our well-honed project management approach and our deep bench of professionals equip us to rapidly address our clients' important and complex business challenges with high-quality, cutting-edge, secure, and easy-to-use software. Your responsibilities: Develop, implement, and maintain QA processes and procedures. Participate in software planning and design activities to ensure quality requirements are met. Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts to ensure product quality and conformance to business requirements. Identify defects and work with the development team to resolve issues. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure software application testing is integrated and effective Lead and participate in continuous process improvement efforts to increase the quality and efficiency of testing processes Collect and analyze metrics to monitor testing progress and software quality Manage and maintain the testing environment and testing data Participate in training and mentoring for other members of the team Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên  Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian  Quyền lợi được hưởng: Why You'll Love Working Here Flexible working-hours, Dynamic, Innovative and Friendly environment Personal Development and challenging projects Great opportunity to growth career path, personal development, and challenging projects Develop global career path by providing many trainings (Technical & soft-skills) Have chance to work directly with CTO/CEO of many Startup around the world We're strong remote workforce & global culture with team members from different countries This is a full-time position, in-house, with a competitive salary and benefits package. Comfortable working in a team-oriented environment with changing priorities and deadlines. Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học  Yêu cầu công việc: Your Skills and Experience At least 3 years of experience in software quality assurance (QA) or quality control (QC) Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures Experience with manual and automated testing tools and technologies. 167.job: Field Data Collection Enumerator, Viet Nam/Thailand
167.job_description: Preferred by Nature is conducting field data collection work in Tay Ninh (Vietnam), and Buri Ram, Surin, Khon Kaen (Thailand). We are currently looking for enumerators to collect data from rubber farmers in the area.  What you can expect: As an Enumerator, you will be responsible for collecting reliable and high-quality data from rubber farmers and dealers. Your duties will include conducting daily field visits, accurately recording data, and adhering to the established guidelines and protocols. You will also participate in coordination meetings with the Team Coordinator and provide regular updates on your progress to ensure daily targets are met.  Responsibilities  Conduct field-visit to collect data from farmers using traceability mobile apps. The data includes polygon mapping of farmer’s plantation, fill in questionnaire, and coordinate mapping for facilities and infrastructures such as school, hospitals, etc. Work with rubber traders and support their adoption of the tool. Achieve daily target of up to 5 farmers data per day, equal to 429 farmers data in total of 4,5 months. Communicate regularly with the Team Coordinator, reporting challenges and providing updates on data collection activities. Important that you:  Have a high school diploma or bachelor’s degree in relevant field (e.g., a degree in agriculture, environmental science, geography, or related fields is preferred. Fresh graduates are welcome. Prior experience in data collection, field surveys, or agricultural research is desirable. Understanding of the local geography, culture, and agricultural practices in the target regions (Tay Ninh Province in Vietnam and Buri Ram, Surin, Kon Khaen Province in Thailand). Based in the target regions are preferred. Must own a reliable motorbike to travel to various field locations independently. Must possess a functional mobile phone capable of running data collection applications and maintaining regular communication with the team. Strong interpersonal skills to effectively communicate with farmers, dealers, and team members. Ability to conduct interviews and gather qualitative data. Ability to travel to remote areas and work in challenging field conditions. Willingness to work outdoors for extended periods.  If this sounds like you, we would love to hear from you!What Sets Us Apart:  Competitive salary commensurate with experience and qualifications. Opportunity to work with leading international organizations in the field of sustainability and agriculture. Exposure to best practices and advanced methodologies in data collection and field research. Hands-on experience in fieldwork, providing valuable skills and knowledge. Networking opportunities with professionals and experts in the industry. Collaboration with a dedicated and experienced team. Continuous support and guidance from team leaders and project managers.  Preferred by Nature Preferred by Nature is a non-profit, mission driven organisation that works for sustainable land management and climate-friendly solutions. With 300+ employees and a network of local experts, we develop practical solutions to drive positive impacts in production landscapes and supply chains in 100+ countries. We focus on forest and climate impact commodities and related sectors.  How to apply: If you feel you meet the requirements of the role, please submit your CV and cover letter including salary expectations by 10 September 2024 via the application form below. Application pre-screening will be conducted during the application period. Preferred by Nature wishes our staff to reflect the diversity of society and thus welcomes applications from all qualified candidates regardless of personal background.For questions, please contact: Hilma Lahay hsl@pbn.org

170.job: ACTIVITY INSTRUCTOR - Việc làm gần đây
